Why Buy Precious Metals from APMEX?

APMEX, the leading Precious Metals retailer in the United States, understands the needs of Gold and Silver investors. Now celebrating 15 years in business, APMEX distinguishes itself through exceptional customer service, unmatched product quality and options and a brain trust of resources to help investors develop their ideal investment portfolio.

Although Precious Metals can be part of a balanced portfolio, APMEX understands this investment isn’t for everyone. It may not suit those who prefer to see their wealth confined purely to numbers on a page. Thrill-seekers may be disappointed to find that Gold and Silver prices don’t fluctuate wildly at the whim of global stock markets, as many factors are involved in Precious Metals pricing. Unlike traders of other buy-today-sell-tomorrow commodities, investors in Gold and Silver have been known to pass down their collections to future generations. They understand the unique value of an investment they can hold.

Gold and Silver Prices

Precious Metals prices are perhaps the most important factor to consider when building your investment. Don’t underestimate the importance of relying on a reputable source. Make APMEX your hub for Gold and Silver prices.

Simply look to the right-hand sidebar of the APMEX website for instant updates on Gold, Silver, Platinum and Palladium bid and ask spot prices. At a glance, charts show the daily price progression of APMEX’s most popular Precious Metals offerings. More in-depth pricing information is also available on the website. Comprehensive historical pricing data for Gold and Silver prices going back 30 years is available free through APMEX.

How are Gold and Silver prices determined? A number of factors are taken into consideration. Precious Metals prices are influenced by current events, market speculation, currency values, supply and demand and buying power. But rest assured that regardless of these factors, Precious Metals retain intrinsic value as a tangible and fungible commodity.

The best way to stay on top of price fluctuations is to become an APMEX account member and register for price alerts by email or text message. There is no better way to maximize your buying position, as well as your sell or exit strategy.

Extensive Selection of Precious Metals for Sale

Your investment is sensible, but it should also be beautiful. Whether you are seeking Silver coins for sale or Gold bars for sale, look beyond the luster of the Precious Metals and consider designs that represent your personality and interests.

A bouquet of string instruments adorn Gold Philharmonic coins produced by the Munze Österreich, or Austrian Mint, in Vienna. Lady Liberty casts open her arm on American Silver Eagles, the world’s only Silver bullion coin whose weight, content and purity are guaranteed by the United States government.

Find these and thousands more options through APMEX. With APMEX, your Precious Metals purchase is guaranteed and fully insured. Learn more about your purchasing and shipping options, and find APMEX reviews from satisfied customers, through APMEX.

Why APMEX?

Transparency

Our clear-cut pricing overview means you can get all the information you need to make a solid investment decision. We offer you easy options that make the purchasing process simple and fast.

Concierge Service

Our concierge philosophy means you always get premium service on your order. Not only do we offer some of the industry’s fastest shipping, but we also provide personalized support.

Selection

APMEX offers an outstanding selection, with more than 10,000 products in stock and ready to ship. We carry coins of substantial numismatic value in addition to bullion bars and rounds.

Education

Understanding your investment is essential. APMEX’s education section offers a range of introductory materials, providing critical fundamentals of Precious Metal investing.
